questions: Ki ki? What are you doing?
Why did you take my sign?
ats: @, I can rely on only you.
@, you should meet her at least once.
Hey! Here is @, the wanted man!
@, it is I, Sahasrahla the elder!
@! You are a second too late.
@, I'm going out for a while.
@, can you hear me? It's me, Zelda.
@, it is I, Sahasrahla the elder.
other: I don't have anything more to give you.
I will mark the spot on your map.
Oh!? You got the Pendant Of Courage!
I sell them for 500 Rupees a pair.
Help me… I am in the dungeon of the castle.
You can shoot arrows until you run out!
Are you sure this is not yours?
This is my top secret room.
I'll give you five shots for 20 Rupees.
Like the true Hero that you are…
You aren't just a normal guy, are you?
You don't have any empty bottles.
I'm all sold out of bottles.
Ahhh, I want to be a chicken again!
I sealed the door to his room.
Are you talking about the grandpa?
Ribbit! I have a request of you.
How many Rupees will you toss?
You can focus power in the blade.
You can often find valuables in chests.
I will mark his house on your map.
Well, I'll open a chest for you.
Ki ki ki ki! Good choice!
This way to the Lost Woods
At last you have the three Pendants…
Ganon's cruel power is to blame!
But I want you to come back again…
I will draw you into the Dark World!
This is the Medicine of Life.
You can keep what is inside.
Heh heh… Thank you, young one…
Please take me to my partner!
Its Golden Power is in your hands…
The Master Sword awaits you there.
Then I will lend you my shovel.
Then I get 100 of your Rupees.
Red is the medicine of life.
It's the secret of my success…
Us soldiers have been around, kid.
He gave you the Magic Mirror!
Do you have something to ask me?
Please… You are our only hope…
Go home and get some sleep!
You can't open any more chests.
I will make your wish come true.
I can only rely on you.
…Err, is that OK with you, sir?
You are short on Magic Power!
You found the Book of Mudora!
I will hide Princess Zelda here.
You look strong for a kid.
You can do it! You can…
Tra la la, look for Sahasrahla.
You can open two chests for 30 Rupees.
The soldiers are coming to Sanctuary!
There are holes in the ground.
You can stay up when you're grown up!
Drop by again anytime you want to.
Help me push it from the left!
I am too old to fight.
You turned me into a human.
I will give this back to you then.
I'm sure the old man there will help us.
I'll be waiting for your return.
So you're broke, eh? Too bad…
I love Rupees more than anything.
You can't use this item now.
Green is the medicine of magic.
So the doorway is open again…
I believe you will destroy Ganon.
What is Ganon's wish, you ask?
Take my sword and shield and listen.
I will be waiting for you.
You can pick up and carry stones now!
Sanctuary is just beyond that door.
BOING! It can grapple many things!
Let me talk to you for a while.
Check out the cave east of Lake Hylia.
This is the Village Of Outcasts.
Well, I can make your wish come true!
Oh! Happy days are here again!
Now, touch it with a wish in your heart.
This is the Medicine of Magic.
Do you want to throw Rupees?
Where is he? Is he all right?
You won the Pendant Of Wisdom!
You won the Pendant Of Power!
This is the master key of the dungeon.
I'm Kiki the monkey ki ki!
I will give you something important…
Its chill magic blasts the air!
Well, come back and play some time.
You borrowed the Bug Catching Net!
Mmmmm… The smell of rotten fruit…
He eliminated the good King of Hyrule…
You got the Pendant Of Wisdom!
Aha! It is the Book Of Mudora.
I've got good reason to be stressed out!
He gives you the Pegasus Shoes!
I used to live in Kakariko Town.
You can dig in many places.
I told you not to leave the house…
You can open a chest after paying Rupees!
I'm glad to have company to talk to.
I want to see that place again…
It is to rule the entire cosmos!
You can feel strength in both hands!
You can't use them without a Bow.
Now, go forward to the palace.
I hope you will be healthy.
I know you can save Hyrule!
I fear the worst for my father…
What can I do for you, young one?
I can't believe you caught me!
The Triforce is waiting for a new owner.
I'm sure you will like her.
Ganon's wish was to conquer the world.
I want you to have it.
You are invisible when you wear it!
Call a soldier if you see him!
Will you try to find it for me?
Oh? Who are you, Mr. Bunny?
You got the Cane Of Byrna!
But I am not ready to admit defeat yet.
You won the Pendant Of Courage!
You got the Moon Pearl, huh?
Then you must rescue Zelda without fail.
I hope I get well soon…
You look like a straight shooter…
Use it to regain your Life power.
Well, my mind is getting hazy…
They have taken her to the castle.
One pair of flippers coming up.
I will give this to you if you go away!
I will return your Rupees to you.
Here, taste a sample of the Red Potion…
When you see a whirlpool, dive into it.
Come back after you earn more Rupees.
I'll give you a big discount!
Now, go to the Tower Of Ganon!
I present you with a piece of Heart!
You got the Pendant Of Power!
You never know what you'll find!
I'll buy it for 100 Rupees, OK?
Now, now, don't tell me a lie.
You can learn a lot from us.
Now I will take your Rupees.
It helps you recover your Life.
You will find the elder Sahasrahla…
Do you have a bottle to keep a bug in?
Then I will lend you a shovel.
Will you keep it secret from everyone else?
I don't want to go there!
You are an honest person. I like you.
This is the way I heard it…
You can drop this Bomb off anywhere.
I believe in you… Good luck!
Now I will tell you more of the legend…
You're just getting in the way!
You got the Cane Of Somaria!
Do you really want to find it?
BOING! This is the Hook Shot!
Yo! The fog in the forest is clearing.
I'm sorry, we're not done yet.
Have a nice day! See you!
Save some Rupees and come back.
Now, you should get the Master Sword.
I will accompany you for a while.
Maybe he can tell you more…
The Waterfall Of Wishing is just ahead.
This rod commands the red fire!
Beware of deep water and Zora!
What do you want, little man?
What're you doing up this late, kid?
This mirror is blue, clear and beautiful…
Oh? This is my son's flute…!
You can give this to anyone who wants it.
Uhh… I wanted to give you this.
I am in the dungeon of the castle.
… I see. You don't have one…
But I will never give you the Triforce.
I have no reason to talk to you, then.
Now, go for the last one!
Not just anyone can use that weapon.
Not just anyone can use that sword.
Blue renews both life and magic.

questions: Is this what I think it is?

Did you get the red stone?
Do you want to keep it?
ats: Have you been practicing a lot, @?
Mister, do you know a kid named @?
@, you're a hero to us Gorons!
Someone you know must be that Sage, @…
I have been waiting for you, @.

Have you ever met a kid named @?
I wonder if @ will ever return?
Help @ to carry out my will…
@, I hear Goron voices down below.
@…we're back in the Temple of Time…
@, are you going to go away?
Have you already met him, Mx. @?
@, you have fully matured as an adult.
other: Well, let's cut to the chase…
I don't feel like getting down, ever!
You know, I'm so grateful to you.
You can get the new mask model, too.
How do you like the feel of it?

You need to be ready for anything.

I'll give you something very nice!

I will give you a magic spell.

I am the Great Fairy of Courage!
They hold the Spiritual Stone of Fire.
I came here to sell bombs…
You're a fairy kid from the forest!
Well, that cheered me up a little, kid.
Can't you read the sign over there?

Well…no, I don't think I want it.

I can't sell them to you.
But do not grieve for me…
This time, you gotta do it!
He's not really a bad person at all…

If you can't find them, I win.

the way you are supposed to be…

I have to for this job!

Thanks to you, we're all OK!

I should go to Lake Hylia!

All of them will be eaten by Volvagia!

I really want to repairrrrr it, but…

You've grown so big since I last saw you!
I don't have time to talk to you!

anymore… I can't hold it any longer…

the heart of one who enters it…
